name: Project DART (NES)
description:
Project DART is a high-speed arcade-style game for the NES. Hop on your motorcycle and race along an endless roadway. Dodge walls and pop wheelies to increase your score as much as possible before you inevitably crash! Grab a 2nd player and compete for who can last the longest!

How long can you survive on the Forever Road?

- Created with NESmaker 4.1.5.
